title: Audio
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <audio> tag is used to embed sound content in a document, such as music or other audio streams.

usageExamples.title: Basic Audio Element
usageExamples.code:
<audio controls>
  <source src="audioFile.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  Your browser does not support the audio tag.
</audio>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/audio @controls=""
	/source @src="audioFile.mp3" @type="audio/mpeg"
  Your browser does not support the audio tag.

usageExamples.title: Autoplay Audio
usageExamples.description: Embedding audio that automatically plays when loaded.
usageExamples.code:
<audio autoplay>
  <source src="audioFile.mp3" type="audio/mpeg">
  Your browser does not support the audio tag.
</audio>
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/audio @autoplay=""
	/source @src="audioFile.mp3" @type="audio/mpeg"
  Your browser does not support the audio tag.
